meanings.definition: In a way that involves refraining from indulging in something, typically food or drink.
meanings.sent1: She ate abstinently, avoiding all sugary treats.
meanings.sent2: He abstinently skipped dessert to stick to his diet.
meanings.sent3: The cookies begged to be eaten, but she resisted abstinently.
meanings.sent4: His willpower shone brightly as he abstinently passed on the tempting buffet.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread tested her abstinently resolve.

meanings.sent1: He spoke abstinently, choosing his words carefully.
meanings.sent2: She abstinently refrained from interrupting the speaker.
meanings.sent3: The child abstinently waited for permission to open the gift.
meanings.sent4: The artist worked abstinently, perfecting every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The student abstinently resisted the urge to check their phone during the exam.
